lines.text: I feel like an old lion being thrown to the Christians.
My dear, you have to be an very good actress to be a successful wife.
All the crooners are young fellas. The American public have never allowed a crooner to live to a ripe old age. And 120 million people can't be wrong.
It's for charity... The Seamen's Institute... you know... to keep the sailors off the streets.
How do you know the sailors WANT to be kept off the streets.
